body.name: Power Strip Surge Protector - Flat Plug, Wall Mount, 8 Wide Outlets with 4 USB Ports (1 USB C), 5FT Heavy Duty Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets, Charging Station Overload Protection for Home Dorm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 56 mins
features: 【12 IN 1 Power Strip with USB-C】- The extension cord with 8 AC outlets and 4 USB ports can power up 12 devices simultaneously. USB C charging port features 5V/3A Max, USB A port features 5V/2.4A Max, compatible with almost all usb devices. No a variety of chargers required, that is convenient and efficient, also saving the space.

【3 Side Design & Wide Spaced Outlets】- 3-side design and each AC outlets with 2 inches space in between, larger than standard 1.5 inch socket. Making it enough to fit big adapters and suitable for all kinds of equipment. Takes up less space on your desk or wall due to this compact 3-sided design, suitable for the home, office, and dorm room.

【Surge Protection & Overload Protection】- 900 Joules surge protector with overload protection protects your electrical appliances from lighting, surges or spikes. The reset/off switch with integrated circuit breaker for overload protection of all outlets. This power strip has overload protection, short-circuit protection, over current protection, over-voltage protection and overheating protection.

【UL approval 5FT Cord】Extra long extension cord with accredited by UL, which is made of pure copper, that delivers reliable power and holds up to 15A of power. The 5-foot power cord is long enough to reach distant wall outlet sockets.

【Flat Plug & Wall Mount】The flat plug features a low profile fits easily tight spaces behind sofa, nightstand, bookshelf and headboard. This mountable power strip can be fixed on the wall or desk by 2 keyhole slots on the back.
body.description: Surge Protector Power Strip with USB-C Port 8 AC outlets and 4 USB ports with a 5 ft cable power an complete workstation or home entertainment center.Build-in smart IC technology delivers an optimized charge speed up to 5V/2.4A to USB A port, 5V/3A to USB C port. 900J surge protector can protect your devices from lighting, surges or spikes. With circuit breaker provides protection against electrical overload, assuring that your unit is safe from overheating and overcurrent.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specifications: Rated Voltage: 110-125 V/ 50/ 60 Hz Rated Current: 15A Maximum Power: 1875W Surge Protector Rating: 900 joules USB Port Output: DC 5V, Total 3.1A USB-C Output: 3A MAX USB-A Output: 2.4A MAX Dimensions: 4.5*3.7*1.5 in Surge Protector Power Strip with USB-C Port 8 AC outlets and 4 USB ports with a 5 ft cable power an complete workstation or home entertainment center.Build-in smart IC technology delivers an optimized charge speed up to 5V/2.4A to USB A port, 5V/3A to USB C port. 900J surge protector can protect your devices from lighting, surges or spikes. With circuit breaker provides protection against electrical overload, assuring that your unit is safe from overheating and overcurrent.

Smart USB Charging Ports High-speed USB ports automatically detect charging devices and deliver optimal charging speed, USB C charging port features 3A Max, USB A charging port features 2.4A Max (5V 3.1A shared rating), it can charge 3 portable devices simultaneously. Overload Protection In the event of power overload (Rated Power: 1875W), the reliable safety switch will trip off automatically to protect your devices and your home. The switch is designed to be perfectly loose, to ensure it won't get stuck after long time of use. Surge Protection Safety is important. Ensure the safety of your electronics with the 900 Joules protection rating and integrated circuit breaker. The green indicator light assures connected electronics are protected from surges or spikes.

Wall Mounted Type Mount this usb power outlet on the wall or desk would be easily by 2 slots on the back. Note: Mounting screws not included. Low-Profile Flat Plug The space-saving design of the flat plug could allow the power cord to sit close to the wall. 45 degrees angled plug keeps other wall outlets unblocked. Upgraded extension cord This wire inside an extension cord is made of 100% copper, which is excellent conduction of electricity. UL Approved extension cord is thicker and safer, low loss and low heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Compact design... good cord length... works well... multiple outlets.... worth the buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Creatively designed and convenient
reviews.reviewText: This is really well engineered surge protector, the placement for all of the outlets is clearly cleverly designed, and convenient especially if you have large AC adapters that take up a lot of room.I personally mounted this device with double sided tape behind my TV. It’s been working great so far, may have to buy a few more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile power strip
reviews.reviewText: The Power Strip Surge Protector is an essential travel companion, offering exceptional versatility and convenience. With eight wide outlets and four USB ports, including one USB-C, it easily accommodates a variety of devices, making it perfect for hotel stays. The flat plug design and wall-mount capability are thoughtful features that save space and allow for easy placement in often cramped hotel rooms. Its surge protection offers peace of mind, safeguarding devices from unexpected power surges. This power strip's combination of functionality, portability, and safety features make it an ideal choice for travelers needing to power multiple devices

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing technology in a small and cost effective package.
reviews.reviewText: The package came quickly and well packaged. Upon opening I was a bit surprised on the lightness of the actual device. The carrying case is solid and offers a decent protection to the equipment within. The device optic's cable is long enough for my purposes, and is rigid enough to maintain a lock on the image. The images are amazing considering the size of the lens. The flashlight at the tip is quite bright and does an amazing job at lighting up the area around the target. Having a second camera arranged at a 90degree angle is a nice touch when trying to get a better perspective on the area being observed, can be used to hunt around while locking in on target.I have now recorded several images which is a powerful capability, I have yet to determine the video benefit as it relates to my individual purposes but does perform well, almost as good as the images taken.Overall I would say that this is an amazing little device that I plan to use for multiple functions, including working behind walls as well as automotive work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A practical, useful upgrade for your home with major impact on your daily life.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a real drag to be living in a modern, hi-tech world in a home with an electric supply that’s from another time. This incredibly useful little product changed all that for me and supercharged my world with power to spare no more spreading devices out all over the apartment and having to unplug a lamp to charge a phone etc… this simple, inexpensive power supply is one of the most practical and useful upgrades I have ever made to my home…seriously. No need for plug “blocks”-usb ports are built right in. The cost of those plug “blocks” alone is way more than the cost of this outlet extension- and you get a lot more than that with the standard 3 prong plugs that are on every side and allow for a tangle free, sensible approach to your charging needs and helps to bring your home into the modern age. You won’t really know how much you needed this until you have it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact great for top of desk
reviews.reviewText: Review for 10ft cord, white. Just set this up. I really like it. I was able to organize all my wires for my laptop and extra monitor and plug in my iPhone, and various Apple charging earphones neatly. Set it up right on my desk stashed behind the monitor with easy access and it does not take up much space. No more crawling on the floor to plug in stuff. No more dust bunnies collecting on a rats nest of wires on the floor. What is not obvious but a real plus is a shut off switch on the side with a very dim green indicator light . other products have annoying bright lights and multiple shutoff's which are ridiculous. The plug has an offset right angle so you save space beside furniture and can plug something else into your wall outlet. Prior to getting this i had an old school power strip. the wires were all over the place with charging cubes 10ft phone charge wires etc. I was able to eliminate all that mess. I found various original charging wires that came with Apple devices including USB C for my 13 and was able to use shorter original equipment wires for all these gadgets. I took the time to twist tie excess wires and use rubber bands to hold excess wire for laptop and monitor. looks really neat and organized now. The one thing I wish it had was some non skid rubber feet or something however once i strapped all the excess wires with rubber bands around the contraption it added weight and resistance from the bands and the thing stays put on my table that i use to work remotely on. I guess you could find some product to glue rubber feet if you don't want to just screw this to your wall or side of desk. Oh yes, it has holes on the back to attach to a wall or workstation. Well designed, practical and functional. I have been using it for a few hours now and it gives off zero heat. So long as this thing keeps working.....I really like it. I like it so much I just ordered 9 more, 3 I will use for additional work stations and 6 for stocking stuffers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dorms!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my sons to have in his dorm room. He said it works great and is super handy to have. Good purchase and reasonably priced!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Solid price and great product. Very happy with how small and compact for all my desk cords.
